verses.roman:
bhagavaty udite sūrye
nanda-dvāri vrajaukasaḥ
dṛṣṭvā rathaṁ śātakaumbhaṁ
kasyāyam iti cābruvan

synonyms: bhagavati—the lord; udite—when he rose; sūrye—the sun; nanda-dvāri—in the doorway of Nanda Mahārāja's home; vraja-okasaḥ—the residents of Vraja; dṛṣṭvā—seeing; ratham—the chariot; śātakaumbham—made of gold; kasya—whose; ayam—this; iti—thus; ca—and; abruvan—they spoke.
translation: When the godly sun had risen, the people of Vraja noticed the golden chariot in front of Nanda Mahārāja's doorway. "Who does this belong to?" they asked.
